abstract: A systematic literature review is a scientific means of identifying, evaluating and interpreting all available research relevant to a particular research topic, enabling its evaluation, pointing the results and gaps between researches. Due its guidelines, the systematic review is a laborious process that requires a rigorous documented protocol for scientific recognition. In this context, this review aims to contribute with a critical analysis of automated approaches that use artificial intelligence concepts to support the systematic reviews, facilitating its application and ensuring the quality of the process. sistemáticas, facilitando a aplicação da metodologia e assegurando a qualidade do processo. Palavras-chave: Revisão Sistemática da Literatura, Redes Neurais, Inteligência Artificial.
